title: White House denies Tom Homan took $50,000 from undercover FBI agents
shortDescription: The White House denied border czar Tom Homan accepted $50,000 in cash bribes as alleged in a Justice Department investigation that was shut down.

title: What is leucovorin? Trump, RFK's potential answer to autism, explained
shortDescription: Trump administration officials are expected to discuss a medication called leucovorin as a potential treatment for autism.

title: Trump urges Bondi to prosecute his political opponents
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump has urged Attorney General Pam Bondi to have the Justice Department pursue legal action against several of his political adversaries.

title: Watch livestream: Trump set to make announcement on autism research
shortDescription: The Trump administration is set to make an announcement about autism research on Monday afternoon, Sept. 22.

title: TikTok reaches deal to keep operating in US, White House says
shortDescription: TikTok has reached a preliminary deal to sell its U.S. operations to an American-based investor group, the White House said.

title: Pope Leo talks Trump, Vance, politics in new interview
shortDescription: The Catholic Church's first American pope, Pope Leo XIV, says in an in-depth interview that he hasn't met or spoken with President Trump − yet.

title: Trump expected to announce 'answer' to autism, blame Tylenol: Live
shortDescription: Trump is expected to unveil his 'answer' to autism by blaming the use of Tylenol by pregnant women, which the company denies.

title: Man accused in Trump assassination plot rests his case
shortDescription: Ryan Routh, the man accused of trying to kill President Donald Trump in Florida last year, rested his case on Sept. 22.

title: Trump, Musk reunite at Charlie Kirk’s funeral
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Elon Musk set aside differences to honor Charlie Kirk at his funeral in a rare public reunion.

title: Trump teases potential TikTok deal investors
shortDescription: President Donald Trump teased potential names in the proposed TikTok deal, mentioning the Murdochs and Larry Ellison, during a Fox News interview.

title: Trump officials to announce autism findings
shortDescription: The Trump administration is set to announce their findings of what may contribute to autism, but medical groups dispute their claim.

title: Trump shakes hands, meets with Musk at Kirk memorial after public rift
shortDescription: "Elon came over and said hello," Trump told reporters after the event, adding: "I thought it was nice, he came over, we had a little conversation."

title: Morgan Murphy enters race to replace Tommy Tuberville in US Senate
shortDescription: Morgan Murphy, a former Tommy Tuberville aide who left his job at the Trump White House, says he's running for Alabama’s open Senate seat.

title: Trump teases announcement on autism during Charlie Kirk memorial
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said his administration will reveal how autism “happens, so we won’t let it happen anymore."

title: Trump Jr. impersonates father at Charlie Kirk memorial
shortDescription: Donald Trump Jr. attempted to bring some humor to Charlie Kirk's memorial by impersonating his father critiquing his "grossly inappropriate" memes.

title: Trump says Charlie Kirk was a 'great man'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told members of the press that Charlie Kirk was a "great man" on his way to the funeral in Arizona.

title: See photos of Trump, conservative leaders celebrating Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump memorialized conservative activist Charlie Kirk during a memorial in Arizona. See photos from the event.

title: Trump approval poll: See where president stands on crime, immigration
shortDescription: A majority of Americans disapprove of President Donald Trump's job performance, according to a new poll.

title: 'NOW!!' Trump pressures DOJ's Pam Bondi to go after his political foes
shortDescription: Trump took to social media to pressure his attorney general to move forward on investigations into three of his adversaries.

title: 'Debt of gratitude': Trump, conservative leaders celebrate Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: Tens of thousands of mourners, including President Donald Trump, honored the life of slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk.
